data.title: Resume Writing & Optimization
data.description: Professional resume writing service that transforms your experience into a compelling story. Our experts craft ATS-friendly resumes that get you noticed by hiring managers.

data.title: Interview Coaching & Preparation
data.description: Master your interview skills with personalized coaching sessions. Practice common questions, improve your body language, and build confidence for any interview scenario.

data.title: LinkedIn Profile Enhancement
data.description: Optimize your LinkedIn profile to attract recruiters and showcase your professional brand. Complete profile makeover including headline, summary, and keyword optimization.

data.title: Job Search Strategy Consulting
data.description: Develop a targeted job search plan tailored to your industry and career goals. Learn effective networking strategies and how to leverage job boards efficiently.
data.imageAlt: Job search strategy meeting with consultant

data.title: Career Transition Support
data.description: Navigate career changes with confidence. Get guidance on transferring skills to new industries, addressing employment gaps, and positioning yourself for career pivots.

data.title: Salary Negotiation Coaching
data.description: Learn to negotiate your worth with confidence. Master the art of salary negotiation, understand market rates, and develop strategies for compensation discussions.

data.title: Portfolio & Work Sample Development
data.description: Create a stunning portfolio that showcases your best work. Perfect for creative professionals, developers, and anyone who needs to demonstrate their skills visually.

data.title: Application Tracking & Follow-up
data.description: Stay organized and maximize your application success rate. Our system helps track applications, schedule follow-ups, and manage your job search pipeline effectively.
